nodes.text: Orthog was a male dock worker on the Colossus.

Orthog is first seen on one of the Colossus's docking pads, where the Star Commuter 2000 carrying Poe Dameron and Kazuda Xiono to the planet Castilon lands. Kaz notices rought activity on the pad, including Orthog shoving a man to the ground. Orthog is one of the first three to hear the rumor that Kaz is the best star fighter pilot in the galaxy, spread by Neeku Vozo. Orthog then tells a woman about Kaz, claiming he was the top pilot in the Western Reaches.
Orthog is a male of unknown species and a resident of the Colossus. He has a sort of snout, and two small tusks on his lower lip. His ears are dotted with numerous holes. He has a raspy voice.
Orthog first appeared in "The Recruit", the Season One premiere of Star Wars Resistance, he was voiced by Fred Tatasciore. In the eighth episode "Synara's Score", he was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker.
